label: logicB:manufacturing_en
steps: [1] If a batch is from an approved supplier, then it passes incoming inspection.
[2] If a batch passes incoming inspection, then it is released to production.
[3] For every machine x, if x passes calibration, then x is qualified for production.
[4] If the batch is released to production and CNC-12 is qualified for production, then the production run can start.
[5] The batch is from an approved supplier.
[7] The batch is released to production and CNC-12 is qualified for production.
